title: Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees
content:
1. Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees  Associated Press
  2. Putin warns of possible military response over ‘aggressive’ Nato  The Guardian
  3. As Ukraine tensions mount, Putin says Russia has 'every right' to 'react harshly to unfriendly steps'  CNN
  4. Putin blames West for tensions as fears rise over Ukraine  Al Jazeera English
  5. Putin blames West for tensions since end of Cold War  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
